module.name: HTML
module.param:
test with serialized context

$search$
earliest=$search.timeRange.earliest$
latest=$search.timeRange.latest$

sid=$results.sid$

module.name: HTML
module.param:
test with scheduled search, default useHistory

$search$
earliest=$search.timeRange.earliest$
latest=$search.timeRange.latest$
results.count=$results.count$
results.eventCount=$results.eventCount$
results.resultCount=$results.resultCount$
results.scanCount=$results.scanCount$
results.eventAvailableCount=$results.eventAvailableCount$
results.eventFieldCount=$results.eventFieldCount$
results.runDuration=$results.runDuration$

sid=$results.sid$

module.name: HTML
module.param:
test with scheduled search, useHistory=True

$search$
earliest=$search.timeRange.earliest$
latest=$search.timeRange.latest$
results.count=$results.count$
results.eventCount=$results.eventCount$
results.resultCount=$results.resultCount$
results.scanCount=$results.scanCount$
results.eventAvailableCount=$results.eventAvailableCount$
results.eventFieldCount=$results.eventFieldCount$
results.runDuration=$results.runDuration$

sid=$results.sid$

module.name: HTML
module.param:
Note these realtime savedsearches do not ship. you have to create them manually to run these tests. 
[test_saved_rtsearch_with_schedule]
dispatch.earliest_time = rt-30m@m
dispatch.latest_time = rt
search = index=_internal source=*metrics.log group="per_*_thruput" | head 500 | stats count by group,series
cron_schedule = */15 * * * *
enableSched   = 1
disabled = 1

[test_saved_rtsearch_with_no_schedule]
dispatch.earliest_time = rt-15m@m
dispatch.latest_time = rt
search = index=_internal source=*metrics.log group="per_*_thruput" | head 500 | stats count by group,series
enableSched   = 0
disabled = 1

module.name: HTML
module.param:
test with realtime scheduled search, default useHistory

$search$
earliest=$search.timeRange.earliest$
latest=$search.timeRange.latest$
results.count=$results.count$
results.eventCount=$results.eventCount$
results.resultCount=$results.resultCount$
results.scanCount=$results.scanCount$
results.eventAvailableCount=$results.eventAvailableCount$
results.eventFieldCount=$results.eventFieldCount$
results.runDuration=$results.runDuration$

sid=$results.sid$
